original_text: You would not even put it on your field. It cannot make the soil good. You would just throw it away.
korean_text: 땅에도, 거름에도 쓸 데 없어 내버리느니라 들을 귀가 있는 자는 들을지어다 하시니라

sentences.original_text: You would not even put it on your field.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그것을 밭에 두지도 않을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: It cannot make the soil good.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 토양을 좋게 만들 수 없다.

sentences.original_text: You would just throw it away.
